articles.title: 'Black Adam' shows the mess new DC movie bosses inherit - Business Insider
articles.description: "Black Adam" tries to balance Marvel-like humor with a Zack Snyder-style tone. It's a perfect encapsulation of what's wrong with DC movies.
articles.content:
